lines.text: apple bar, apple bar, sends me all the way!
Beth, baby, you have got to make me believe you eat this junk, now you just gotta!
Apples come in taffy gold, mmm-mmm, they're scrump-tu-ous! Scrump... they're... they... mmmm, they... mmmmm.
Thank you, erm, thank you very much, my dear. We're looking for a singer.
Apples come in chocolate brown, mmm-mm, they're wonderful. Apples come in taffy gold, mmm-mm, they're scrumptious!
Er, honey, you're giving out a little too much rock sound. Make it sweet. Remember, this is the girl next door with freckles.
Can you believe that I believe that the devil's in my house?
Yes. If you believe there's a devil, you believe the devil's in your house; then for you it's true.
